name: Paranoia (itch) (Ancient Meme)
description:
A game where you as a fairy keep Sophia safe and alive from the dangers of the dungeon, whether it be goblins, or other beings.

Controls

Mouse Movement - Controls where the fairy goes

WASD - Movement for Sophia

Left Click - Shoots a crossbow bolt (Requires reload)

F - Toggle fullscreen

Escape - Hold to quit the game

Light

The fairy's light acts as both a way to navigate the dungeon and also a weapon against the dark creatures.

Psychological damage

Sophia is easily frightened as she has just woken up in a deep part of a dark dungeon. Ensure she does not go insane by controlling what is and is not in the light.
